jd: Hello ,I am a Technical Recruiter with Yochana IT, a national IT staffing solutions provider with years of experience delivering value to leading companies across the U.S And CanadaI am currently staffing for Project Manager, Below you will find the job description, if you are qualified and interested please send me your Updated Word Document Resume.My apologies if this position is not an ideal fit, we'll keep you in mind for other suitable positions and referrals would be appreciated.Thank you in advanceRole- Project Manager Location- Princeton NJ • Should have 10+ years of IT Project Management work experience (well versed with all phases of Project Management activities).• Should have managed end to end cloud migration projects in the past on Microsoft Azure Cloud Platform.• Should have Strong IT Technical backgrounds (IT Infrastructure and Apps) and be possess knowledge on Microsoft Cloud Services to interact with stakeholders (App Owners etc.)• Lead the cloud migration effort for the identified applications and work with Multiple Stake holders (App Owners, IT Architecture and Technical Teams etc) to complete the cloud migrations as per defined timeline.• Must have excellent communication skills (Written, Verbal and Project presentations) and be detail oriented.• Experienced in using project mgmt. tools to track the project efforts and provide regular status updates to the project stakeholders.• Good in project Risk Management (Should be an excellent collaborator and ensure to identify, highlight and implement mitigation strategies for the project Risks associated with Cloud Migration.
